titles.title: Veterans Crisis Response Corps Act of 2018
To establish the Veterans Crisis Response Corps, and for other purposes.
Veterans Crisis Response Corps Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Transportation and Infrastructure, Foreign Affairs, and Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care
Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Veterans Crisis Response Corps Act of 2018
This bill establishes the Veterans Crisis Response Corps under which veterans may elect to participate as Corps members in disaster relief and reconstruction projects following a domestic or international man-made or natural disaster.
